content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Ryanah. I appreciate your time. I understand that you are looking for a 25-square-meter apartment and would like to discuss the rental price. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I would like to hear your proposal.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 400 Euros per month.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your proposal, Ryanah. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I must admit, that is a higher rental price than I was expecting. I would need to consider this proposal further before making a decision. May I ask if there is any flexibility in your rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, I cannot negotiate any further.
TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your response, Ryanah. I understand that you are unable to negotiate further. I will consider your proposal of 400 Euros per month, but I am not sure if I can accept it at this time. I will need to think it over and get back to you with my decision.
name: Heinrich Heine
